title: Olympic torchbearer is to shore up PLA and signal to India - Hindustan Times
content:
1. Olympic torchbearer is to shore up PLA and signal to India  Hindustan Times
  2. Indian diplomats to boycott Olympics over China’s torchbearer  Times of India
  3. Galwan Soldier as Olympics Torchbearer Marks the End of ‘Peaceful Rise of China’ Propaganda  News18
  4. India announces diplomatic boycott of Beijing Olympics after Galwan soldier became torchbearer  WION
  5. Final stretch of torch relay held at cultural sites as world awaits Olympic flame to be lit  Global Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The counter to Chinese wolf warrior diplomacy is building up with US President Joe Biden sending his closest political allies as Ambassadors to India, Japan and Australia to strengthen the Indo-Pacific alliance and QUAD. PM Modi by diplomatic boycott of opening and closing ceremony of Winter Olympics has enforced QUAD message.
